docblock.description: Base class for Janitor tasks. Configuration example for .config.php: $Config = [ "executionPeriodicity" => \Cherrycake\Modules\JANITORTASK_EXECUTION_PERIODICITY_ONLY_MANUAL, // The periodicity for this task execution. One of the available CONSTs. \Cherrycake\Modules\JANITORTASK_EXECUTION_PERIODICITY_ONLY_MANUAL by default. ];

var.description: $isConfig Sets whether this JanitorTask has its own configuration file. Defaults to false.
$config Holds the default configuration for this JanitorTask

docblock.description: Loads the configuration file for this JanitorTask, if there's one

param.description: An array of configuration options for this janitor task. It merges them with the hard coded default values configured in the overloaded janitor task class.

docblock.description: Initializes the JanitorTask, intended to be overloaded. Called when the JanitorTask is loaded. Contains any specific initializations for the JanitorTask, and any required loading of dependencies.

return.description: Whether the JanitorTask has been loaded ok

docblock.description: Performs the tasks for what this JanitorTask is meant. Must be overloaded by a higher level JanitorTask class.

param.description: The base timestamp to use for time-based calculations when running this task. Usually, now.

return.description: A one-dimensional array with the keys: {<One of JANITORTASK_EXECUTION_RETURN_? consts>, <Task result/error/health check description. Can be an array if different keys of information need to be given.>}
The timestamp on which this task ran for the last time. False if haven't ever run.

docblock.description: Determines whether this task should be executed on the given timestamp (usually now)

param.description: The timestamp to use for the calculation, usually now. If not provided, the present time is used.

return.description: Whether this task should be executed on the given timestamp (usually now)

docblock.description: Returns a hash array containing status information about this task: The last execution and status.

return.description: A hash array containing status information about this task. Return false if no info about the last execution of this task could be retrieved.

comment.value: Get last execution log for this task

docblock.description: Returns a hash array with debug info for this task. Can be overloaded to return additional info, on which case the specific results should be merged with this results with array_merge(parent::getDebugInfo(), <specific debug info array>)

return.description: Hash array with debug info for this task
Hash array with debug info about the periodicity of this task.

docblock.description: Returns debug info about this task in HTML format
docblock.setup: - tableClass: The CSS class to use for the table

return.description: Debug info about this task in HTML format
